attributes.action: Abolish all tax on female sanitary products by 31st March, 2013
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is absolutely no justification whatsoever, for any taxation on menstrual sanitary products. VAT on such products is a tax on the female sex.

We the undersigned, petition the Government of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, and specifically, HM Treasury, to abolish all forms of tax on items specifically used for womens' feminine menstrual sanitary requirements, by 31st March 2013.
